Thank you, Ron.  Hagihara-sensei is great to work for.  I don't know the exact number yet, but kodogu and koshirae submissions combined were about 180 for the weekend.

Jim



  Hi Jim - 

  Just curious. Can you say about how many pieces of kodogu went through shinsa in Chicago? 

  It must be a great testing-experience to be put through a judging like that along side of somebody like Mr. Hagiwara. Please know your time and though was appreciated.

  Ron
  STL
